snippet: As long-awaited elections approach, faith is slipping in Morgan Tsvangirai’s Movement for Democratic Change, which now governs alongside President Robert Mugabe.
abstract: Zimbabwe voters are losing faith in Morgan Tsvangirai’s Movement for Democratic Change, which now governs alongside President Robert Mugabe; presidential elections are to occur this year and faith that Tsvangirai’s underdog movement could bring a more democratic, peaceful and prosperous future are diminishing.
lead_paragraph: As long-awaited elections approach, faith is slipping in Morgan Tsvangirai’s Movement for Democratic Change, which now governs alongside President Robert Mugabe.

headline.seo: Dismay Grows in Zimbabwe as Underdog Party Tastes Good Life
headline.main: Tasting Good Life, Opposition in Zimbabwe Slips Off Pedestal
headline.print_headline: Tasting Good Life, Opposition In Zimbabwe Slips Off Pedestal
